bug.author: sorrowyn
bug.description: when i try run lib\data_utils\amass_utils.py error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'lib' But you mentioned that throughout the documentation we refer to VIBE root folder as $ROOT.

comments.comment: solutionï¼š export PYTHONPATH="$ROOT:$PYTHONPATH" example: export PYTHONPATH="/data/szx/VIBE:$PYTHONPATH"
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sorrowyn>@sorrowyn</denchmark-link> thanks for noting it. We will update README
